pageContext.claim: “We had the best job numbers that you can imagine -- 250,000.....We just had among the best job numbers we've ever had: 250,000 jobs created in October despite tremendous hurricanes.”
pageContext.analysis: The October jobs numbers exceeded even the high range of consensus forecast, but there have been many months with higher job gains. (The Bureau of Labor Statistics later revised the estimate to 237,000.) Just in August, 286,000 jobs were created. The jobs number topped 250,000 two earlier months in 2018. And Obama had four months above 250,000 in 2016, when Trump was telling audiences that the economy was lousy.
